Complete Music Production Services
Tailored to your budget

We are a Los Angeles, CA based music production company specializing in helping our clients record their music to its fullest potential without breaking the bank.

We've been helping our clients get the most out of their recordings since 2005, when producer, engineer and musician Graham Butler began working with artists in the Nashville area and later Chicago. Since 2012 he's made his home in Los Angeles.

Recording can be an expensive and unpredictable process. We take the guesswork out of it with our unique systematic approach to production which takes advantage of technology to deliver professional-quality results on budget and on schedule.
